column4: I've had trouble with  Beryl using too much cpu in the past and haven't used it in a while, but since yesterday's update, I was curious to see what is new and I am using it now.. X.org alone is using 70% cpu .. .is this normal??
I am playing music and browsing, and just scrolling in FF makes the sound choppy.. this is weird.. how are others successfuly using beryl?
hey im using beryl ... and its know to have ff scrolling issues
mine is sometimes really fast .. toher times its really slow
